t:
When I was learning to drive, I was adviced to always check the backseat of the car before getting in.



As I lie there, knife in hand, I'm amused that people nowadays don't follow that advice.
c:
Strangling them from the back, as they struggle to free themselves is so much fun.



#drive #car #backseat #hide #serialkiller #advice #ignore #knife





https://www.wikipedia.org/wiki/Killer_in_the_backseat
Zombieland, rule 31: Check the back seat
